long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: gnome-maps should be excluded from the autoremove transaction, but it is not:
$ LANG=en_US sudo dnf autoremove --exclude gnome-maps Last metadata expiration check performed 1:51:57 ago on Tue Oct 20 10:34:22 2015. Dependencies resolved. ================================================================================ Package Arch Version Repository Size ================================================================================ Removing: devscripts-minimal x86_64 2.15.9-2.fc24 @rawhide 70 k dpkg x86_64 1.17.25-6.fc24 @rawhide 6.1 M dpkg-perl noarch 1.17.25-6.fc24 @rawhide 564 k gnome-characters x86_64 3.18.1-1.fc24 @rawhide 1.6 M gnome-maps x86_64 3.18.1-1.fc24 @rawhide 1.2 M jack-audio-connection-kit x86_64 1.9.10-3.fc23 @@commandline 2.4 M jack-audio-connection-kit-example-clients x86_64 1.9.10-3.fc23 @@commandline 574 k kernel-modules-extra x86_64 4.3.0-0.rc3.git2.1.fc24 @rawhide 2.1 M libffado x86_64 2.2.1-5.fc23 @@commandline 2.4 M perl-IO-Tty x86_64 1.12-3.fc23 @rawhide 79 k perl-IPC-Run noarch 0.94-3.fc23 @rawhide 317 k perl-IPC-System-Simple noarch 1.25-7.fc23 @@commandline 69 k perl-autodie noarch 2.29-1.fc23 @@commandline 211 k python-dnf-langpacks noarch 0.15.1-1.fc24 @@commandline 76 k python-firewall noarch 0.3.14.2-4.fc24 @@commandline 1.1 M recordmydesktop x86_64 0.3.8.1-15.fc23 @@commandline 128 k tomcat-servlet-3.1-api noarch 1:8.0.26-1.fc24 @@commandline 296 k
Transaction Summary ================================================================================ Remove 17 Packages
Installed size: 19 M Is this ok [y/N]:
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): $ rpm -q dnf dnf-1.1.3-1.fc24.noarch
How reproducible: Always
Steps to Reproduce: 1. 2. 3.
Actual results: DNF tries to remove gnome-maps, although it should be excluded from transaction
Expected results: gnome-maps is excluded from transaction, IOW it is kept on the system.
Additional info:

This bug appears to have been reported against 'rawhide' during the Fedora 24 development cycle. Changing version to '24'.
More information and reason for this action is here: https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/Fedora_Program_Management/HouseKeeping/Fedora24#Rawhide_Rebase
This package has changed ownership in the Fedora Package Database. Reassigning to the new owner of this component.
This problem is fixed with dnf-0:1.1.9-2.fc24.
